job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions, which is a core task in adapting and improving AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are traditional software development activities, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system and the use of human expertise to bridge gaps, fitting the definition of integrating AI into applications.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products, which is a key aspect of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving without constant guidance, aligning with pragmatism and problem-solving.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on integrating AI capabilities into customer resolution processes and improving existing AI systems (Macro-Category A tasks like 'Software Development & Integration'). While there's mention of 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' (Macro-Category B), the primary emphasis is on applying human expertise to support and enhance AI-driven customer service, rather than developing core AI models or specializing in GenAI techniques like prompt engineering or RAG. The role is about using AI as a tool within a broader application context.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. The distinction between core AI development and AI-adjacent application support is evident. However, the lack of specific technologies mentioned and the somewhat aggressive timeline for ramp-up prevent a perfect score.
